item.title: 在 MTN 协议结束后，FirstRand 将赞助南非春季国家队
item.description: FirstRand Ltd. 旗下的第一国民银行取代 MTN Group Ltd. 成为南非国家橄榄球队（Springboks）的新主赞助商。【原文：FirstRand Ltd.’s First National Bank is the new main sponsor of South Africa’s national rugby teams, known as the Springboks, replacing MTN Group Ltd.】

item.title: TD Cowen称微软放弃更多数据中心项目
item.description: 据 TD Cowen 分析师称，微软公司已经放弃了在美国和欧洲的新数据中心项目，这些项目原计划耗电 2 千兆瓦。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has walked away from new data center projects in the US and Europe that had been set to consume 2 gigawatts of electricity, according to TD Cowen analysts, who attributed the pullback to an oversupply of the clusters of computers that power artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长霍尔茨曼认为国防和关税是通胀威胁：华尔街日报
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼在接受《华尔街日报》采访时警告说，增加国防开支和美国的贸易政策有可能刺激消费者物价上涨。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Robert Holzmann warned that additional defense spending and US trade policy risk stoking consumer prices, according to an interview with the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 美国银行股将创历史最长连胜纪录
item.description: 周三，美国大型银行股指数连续第九天延续涨势，有望创下历史最长连涨纪录。【原文：An index of big US bank stocks extended a rally for the ninth straight day on Wednesday, putting it on track to match the longest winning streak on record.】

item.title: 英国规划改革为增长升级的里夫斯提供了生命线
item.description: 周三，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）意外地获得了经济增长的推动力，因为她的财政监督机构认可了她所承诺的规划改革所带来的积极影响。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves was handed an unexpected growth boost on Wednesday as her fiscal watchdog recognized the positive impact of planning reforms she has promised to deliver.】

item.title: 真正软化的初步迹象
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 莫桑比克经济增长乏力，连续减产创纪录
item.description: 莫桑比克央行连续第八次降息，延续了自2017年推出所谓的Mimo利率以来最长的宽松周期。【原文：Mozambique’s central bank cut rates for an eighth straight meeting, extending its longest unbroken easing cycle since it introduced the so-called Mimo rate in 2017.】

item.title: 肯尼亚借入 4.64 亿美元辛迪加贷款用于征收燃料税
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部长约翰-姆巴迪（John Mbadi）表示，肯尼亚已从一个银行财团获得 600 亿先令（约合 4.64 亿美元）的过桥融资，用于结清拖欠公路承包商的未付账单。【原文：Kenya has received 60 billion shillings ($464 million) in bridge financing from a consortium of banks to settle unpaid bills owed to road contractors, according to Treasury Secretary John Mbadi.】

item.title: 垃圾债券赢得了从市场风暴中寻求平静的投资者的青睐
item.description: 垃圾债券似乎不再那么垃圾了。美国投资者正纷纷涌入这一资产类别，近年来，该资产类别已变得更加安全，最近几周还吸引了一些投资者前来寻求避开市场动荡的安全港湾。【原文：Junk bonds don’t seem quite so junky anymore. US investors are piling into an asset class that has grown a little safer in recent years, and in recent weeks has drawn investors seeking a safe harbor from market turbulence.】

item.title: 纽约联储称，近千万学生债务人面临信用风险
item.description: 根据纽约联邦储备银行的研究，随着大流行病时期限制不还款后果的措施逐渐消失，近 1,000 万学生贷款借款人的信用评分面临打击。【原文：Almost 10 million student-loan borrowers face a hit to their credit scores as pandemic-era measures to limit the consequences of non-payment fade from the picture, according to research by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: CBO 称美国财政部最快将于 8 月面临支付违约风险
item.description: 美国国会预算办公室警告说，如果立法者不能提高或暂停债务限额，联邦政府最快可能在8月份就会没有足够的资金来按时支付所有账单。【原文：The Congressional Budget Office warned that the federal government could run out of enough money to pay all of its bills on time as soon as August if lawmakers fail to raise or suspend the debt limit.】

item.title: 资产规模达 1 万亿美元后，主动管理在 ETF 中继续存在
item.description: 随着投资者将资金投入新一代策略，美国主动型交易所交易基金（ETF）持有的总资产已达到 1 万亿美元的里程碑；这打破了这一蓬勃发展的资金管理领域的被动声誉。【原文：Total assets held by actively run ETFs in the US have hit the $1 trillion milestone, as investors sink cash into a new generation of strategies — shaking up the passive reputation of this booming corner of money management.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司有望因努力争取特朗普青睐而实现广告销售增长
item.description: 根据研究公司 Emarketer — 的数据，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司自这位亿万富翁于 2022 年收购该公司以来，有望在第一年实现广告收入增长；部分原因是广告商对马斯克在唐纳德-特朗普政府中的影响力做出了反应。【原文：Elon Musk’s X is on pace for its first year of advertising revenue growth since the billionaire acquired the company in 2022, according to research firm Emarketer — in part because advertisers are reacting to Musk’s power in the Donald Trump administration.】

item.title: 黑海休战谈判到来之际，谷物贸易已接近正常水平
item.description: 美国推动黑海停火，导致克里姆林宫寻求一些制裁减免作为回报，而此时俄罗斯的农作物出口正处于高位，乌克兰几乎恢复到了战前水平。【原文：The US push for a Black Sea ceasefire, that’s led to the Kremlin seeking some sanctions relief in return, comes at a time when crop exports from Russia are riding high and Ukraine is back to almost pre-war levels.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛在里斯本开设办事处，推动南欧增长
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）计划于 9 月在里斯本开设办事处，以利用越来越多居住在葡萄牙等南欧国家的富裕外国人的财富。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. plans to open an office in Lisbon in September as it taps into the wealth of a growing number of affluent foreigners taking up residence in southern European countries like Portugal.】

item.title: 土耳其反对党抨击央行干预动荡局势
item.description: 土耳其的主要反对党指责中央银行为政府提供掩护，帮助政府管理上周伊斯坦布尔市长被拘留事件的金融后果。【原文：Turkey’s main opposition party accused the central bank of providing cover for the government in helping to manage the financial fallout from last week’s detention of the mayor of Istanbul.】

item.title: 象牙海岸 17.5 亿美元欧洲债券吸引了两倍多的需求
item.description: 据一位熟悉该交易的人士称，象牙海岸 17.5 亿美元欧元债券的需求量超过了两倍，这对正在寻求更多资金的西非国家来说是个好消息。【原文：Demand for Ivory Coast’s $1.75 billion eurobond was more than double, according to a person familiar with the deal, in good news for the West African nation as it seeks more funding.】

item.title: 捷克再次停止降息，国防计划增加价格风险
item.description: 由于国内通胀风险持续存在，而全球贸易和地缘政治紧张局势又给经济前景蒙上了阴影，捷克决策者在过去三个月中第二次暂停了货币宽松政策。【原文：Czech policymakers paused monetary easing for the second time in the past three months as domestic inflation risks persist, while global trade and geopolitical tensions cloud the economic outlook.】

item.title: 核反应堆公司 Terrestrial Energy 将通过 SPAC 交易上市
item.description: 一家小型核反应堆开发商将通过一家特殊目的收购公司上市，该公司由前 Cantor Fitzgerald 首席执行官肖恩-马修斯（Shawn Matthews）领导。【原文：A developer of small nuclear reactors is going public via a special purpose acquisition company led by former Cantor Fitzgerald Chief Executive Officer Shawn Matthews.】

item.title: 肉类加工企业 JBS 称关税不会改变其在美国的增长计划
item.description: 全球最大的肉类加工企业 JBS SA 表示，贸易关税不会改变公司在美国的发展计划。【原文：JBS SA, the world’s largest meatpacker, said trade tariffs aren’t changing the company’s growth plans in the US.】

item.title: 英国将在新债务计划中出售 2,990 亿英镑债券，减少长期吉尔债券数量
item.description: 英国正准备实施有史以来规模最大的债券销售计划之一，并计划向投资者提供债务管理办公室历史上比例最小的长期金边债券，从而使借贷更容易接受。【原文：The UK is readying one of its biggest bond sale programs on record and plans to make the borrowing more palatable by offering investors the smallest proportion of long-maturity gilts in the Debt Management Office’s history.】

item.title: 体育画报》将推出与竞技体育相关的投注市场
item.description: 体育画报》品牌正与英国媒体公司 Galactic 合作，推出一个预测市场，允许用户对与体育赛事有关的任何事情下注，但比赛结果除外。【原文：The Sports Illustrated brand is teaming up with UK-based media firm Galactic to launch a predictions market allowing users to bet on anything linked to athletic events — except the outcome of games.】

item.title: 帝国品牌推出五年期股票回购计划以提高回报率
item.description: 帝国品牌公司（Imperial Brands Plc）宣布了一项 "常青 "股票回购计划，以提高投资者回报，并计划削减成本。【原文：Imperial Brands Plc announced an “evergreen” share buyback program to boost investor returns as well as plans to cut costs, as the maker of Winston cigarettes said it expects to meet its full-year guidance.】

item.title: 米莱与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成协议在即，交易商押注阿根廷比索走弱
item.description: 投资者认为阿根廷比索即将再次贬值，在从 2023 年的全球最差货币之一变为去年表现最强劲的货币之一之后，阿根廷比索准备再次改变方向。【原文：Investors see the Argentine peso on the verge of devaluation again, with the currency poised to change direction once more after going from one of the worst in the world in 2023 to among the strongest performers last year.】

item.title: 代理权争夺战威胁后 Starboard 向 Autodesk 董事会提名三名董事
item.description: Starboard Value LP 提名了三名董事进入 Autodesk 公司董事会，在此之前，他们曾威胁要与 Autodesk 公司展开代理权争夺战长达近一年时间。【原文：Starboard Value LP nominated three directors to the Autodesk Inc. board after having threatened a proxy battle for nearly a year.】

item.title: 波兰货币政策委员会主席达布罗夫斯基认为 2025 年降息的可能性为 50/50
item.description: 政策制定者 Ireneusz Dabrowski 表示，由于价格稳定的风险挥之不去，波兰今年维持利率不变的可能性与降低借贷成本的可能性一样大。【原文：Poland is just as likely to keep interest rates unchanged this year due to lingering risks to price stability as it is to reduce borrowing costs, policymaker Ireneusz Dabrowski said.】

item.title: 壳牌和英国石油公司在清洁能源领域看到了贸易优势
item.description:
大型企业在成本高昂的过渡计划上有所退缩，但仍认为 "轻资本 "替代能源大有可为。【原文：

The majors retreated on costly transition plans yet still see promise in ‘capital-light’ alternative energy.

】

item.title: 美国商业设备订单四个月来首次下降
item.description: 2 月份，美国工厂的商业设备订单意外下降，这表明一些公司在等待关税和税收政策的具体细节时限制了投资。【原文：Orders placed with US factories for business equipment unexpectedly declined in February, suggesting some companies are limiting investment as they await specifics on tariffs and tax policy.】

item.title: 加拿大保守党计划为老年人提供更大的避税空间
item.description: 加拿大保守党正在提议为老年人提供广泛的税收减免，包括允许他们在避税退休账户中投资更长的时间，试图在国家大选中重新赢得优势。【原文：Canada’s Conservative Party is proposing a broad tax break for seniors, including allowing them to invest in tax-sheltered retirement accounts for longer, as it tries to regain the advantage in the country’s election.】

item.title: 瑞典将国防开支目标提高至 2030 年占国内生产总值的 3.5
item.description: 瑞典计划到 2030 年将军费开支提高到其经济产出的 3.5%，这明显超过了北约防务集团最新成员去年的目标。【原文：Sweden plans to lift its military spending to 3.5% of its economic output by 2030, clearly more than targeted last year by the newest member of the NATO defense bloc.】
